title: Question 29:
description: How often are prices updated? And where is the price feed/oracle coming from?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
All the live rates can be found on the [exchange](synthetix.exchange) or on this [site](https://codepen.io/justinjmoses/full/vMKywz).  To get the rates using smart contracts,  find the ExchangeRates contract under [here](https://docs.synthetix.io/addresses/).

You can see when and how often the updateRates calls are made.

At anypoint you can access what the exchange rates are on the ExchangeRates Contract

If you want to see the current rate for sBTC. Enter sBTC and click the "Query" button.
The 18 numbers from the right is the decimal place so in this case after putting the value into the [converter](https://etherconverter.online/) will show the price of sBTC is 9294.8611338663351868

fields.title: Chainlink
fields.value: Synthetix plans to use chainlink oracles for all its synths. Currently chainlink is implemented for Forex and Commodities. Check out **question 34** and **question 48** for more details
